body: Anyone care to tell me where the multiple spawns were on Candoria? Saw it in a topic and i'd love to re-introduce them.
body_tagged: Anyone care to tell me where the multiple spawns were on Candoria? Saw it in a topic and i'd love to re-introduce them.
title: Map Question

replies.body:
1. On the beaches where the chests are
2. The current spawns
I think that was all?
replies.body_tagged:
1. On the beaches where the chests are
2. The current spawns

replies.body: Multiple spawns? You mean, every player can spawn on a different section determinated on the YML? :o

Yes, and i've added multiple spawns on candoria now

MD6 is early ;o)
